text: Casey Malone (born 6 April 1977 in Wheat Ridge, Colorado) is an American discus thrower. His personal best is 68.49 metres, achieved in June 2009 in Fort Collins, Colorado. ==Achievements== {| |- !colspan="5"|Representing the |- |1996 |World Junior Championships |Sydney, Australia |bgcolor="gold" | 1st |56.22 m |- |2000 |NACAC U-25 Championships |Monterrey, Mexico |bgcolor=gold|1st |59.19 m |- |rowspan=2|2004 |Olympic Games |Athens, Greece |5th |64.33 m |- |World Athletics Final |Szombathely, Hungary |7th |62.88 m |- |2008 |Olympic Games |Beijing, PR China |19th |61.26 m |} ==External links== * * Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:People from Wheat Ridge, Colorado Category:American male discus throwers Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2004 Summer Olympics Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2008 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic track and field athletes of the United States Category:USA Outdoor Track and Field Championships winners
title: Casey Malone
